Verses: 1 aadhalaal, Neengal Piriyamaana Pillaigalaippola Dhevanaip Pinbatrugiravargalaagi,
2 kiristhu Namakkaagath Thammai Dhevanukku Sugandha Vaasanaiyaana Kaanikkaiyaagavum Baliyaagavum Oppukkoduththu Nammil Anbukoorndhadhupola, Neengalum Anbile Nadandhukollungal.
3 melum, Parisuththavaangalukku Etrapadi, Vesiththanamum, Matrendha Asuththamum, Porulaasaiyumaagiya Ivaigalin Permudhalaai Ungalukkulle Sollappadavunkoodaadhu.
4 appadiye Vambum, Buththiyeenamaana Pechchum, Pariyaasamum Thagaadhavaigal; Sthoththiranseydhale Thagum.

5 vibachaarakkaaranaavadhu, Asuththanaavadhu, Vikkiragaaraadhanaikkaaranaagiya Porulaasaikkaaranaavadhu Dhevanudaiya Raajyamaagiya Kiristhuvin Raajyaththile Sudhandharamadaivadhillaiyendru Arindhirukkireergale.
6 ippadippattavaigalinimiththamaagak Keezhppadiyaamaiyin Pillaigalmel Dhevakobaakkinai Varuvadhaal, Oruvanum Ungalai Veenvaarththaigalinaale Mosampogaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal;
7 avargalukkup Pangaaligalaagaadhirungal.
8 murkaalaththil Neengal Andhagaaramaayirundheergal, Ippozhudho Karththarukkul Velichchamaayirukkireergal; Velichchaththin Pillaigalaai Nadandhukollungal.
9 aaviyin Kani, Sagala Nargunaththilum Needhiyilum Unmaiyilum Vilangum.
10 karththarukkup Piriyamaanadhu Innadhendru Neengal Sodhiththuppaarungal.
11 kaniyatra Andhagaarak Kiriyaigalukku Udanpadaamal, Avaikalaik Kadindhukollungal.
12 avargalaal Olippidaththil Seyyappadum Kiriyaigalai Sollugiradhum Avalatchanamaayirukkiradhe.
13 avaigalellaam Kadindhukollappattu Velichchaththinaal Veliyarangamaagum; Veliyarangamaakkugiradhellaam Velichchamaayirukkiradhu.
14 adhalaal, Thoongugira Nee Vizhiththu, Mariththorai Vittu Ezhundhiru, Appozhudhu Kiristhu Unnaip Piragaasippippaarendru Solliyirukkiraar.
15 aanapadiyinaale, Neengal Gnaanamatravargalaippola Nadavaamal, Gnaanamullavargalaippolak Gavanamaai Nadandhukollappaarththu,
16 naatkal Pollaadhavaigalaanadhaal Kaalaththaip Pirayojanappaduththikkollungal.
17 aagaiyaal, Neengal Madhiyatravargalaayiraamal, Karththarudaiya Siththam Innadhendru Unarndhukollungal.
18 dhunmaarkkaththirku Edhuvaana Madhubaana Verikollaamal, Aaviyinaal Niraindhu;
19 sangeedhangalinaalum Keerththanaigalinaalum Gnaanappaattugalinaalum Oruvarukkoruvar Buththisollikkondu, Ungal Irudhayaththil Karththaraip Paadik Keerththanampanni,
20 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Naamaththinaale Eppozhudhum Ellaavatrirkaagavum Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanai Sthoththiriththu,
21 dheyva Bayaththode Oruvarukkoruvar Keezhppadindhirungal.
22 manaivigale, Karththarukkuk Keezhppadigiradhupola, Ungal Sondhap Purusharukkung Keezhppadiyungal.
23 kiristhu Sabaikkuth Thalaiyaayirukkiradhupola, Purushanum Manaivikkuth Thalaiyaayirukkiraan; Avare Sareeraththirkum Ratchagaraayirukkiraar.
24 aagaiyaal, Sabaiyaanadhu Kiristhuvukkuk Keezhppadigiradhupola Manaivigalum Thangal Sondhap Purushargalukku Endhak Kaariyaththileyum Keezhppadindhirukka Vendum.
25 purushargale, Ungal Manaivigalil Anbukoorungal; Appadiye Kiristhuvum Sabaiyil Anbukoorndhu,
26 thaam Adhaith Thiruvasanaththaikkondu Thanneer Muzhukkinaal Suththigariththu, Parisuththamaakkugiradharkum,
27 karaidhirai Mudhalaanavaigal Ondrum Illaamal Parisuththamum Pizhaiyatradhumaana Magimaiyulla Sabaiyaaga Adhaith Thamakkumun Niruththikkolvadharkum Thammaiththaame Adharkaaga Oppukkoduththaar.
28 appadiye, Purushargalum Thangal Manaivigalaith Thangal Sondhach Sareerangalaagap Paaviththu, Avargalil Anbukooravendum; Than Manaiviyil Anbukoorugiravan Thannilthaan Anbukoorugiraan.
29 than Sondha Maamsaththaip Pagaiththavan Oruvanumillaiye; Karththar Sabaiyaip Poshiththukkaappaatrugiradhu Pola Ovvoruvanum Than Maamsaththaip Poshiththuk Kaappaatrugiraan.
30 naam Avarudaiya Sareeraththin Avayavangalaayum, Avarudaiya Maamsaththirkum Avarudaiya Elumbukkum Uriyavargalaayum Irukkirom.
31 idhinimiththam Manushan Than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Vittu, Than Manaiviyudan Isaindhu, Iruvarum Ore Maamsamaayiruppaargal.
32 indha Ragasiyam Periyadhu; Naan Kiristhuvaippatriyum Sabaiyaippatriyum Sollugiren.
33 eppadiyum, Ungalilum Avanavan Thannidaththil Anbukooruvadhupola, Than Manaiviyinidaththilum Anbukoorakkadavan; Manaiviyum Purushanidaththil Bayabakthiyaayirukkakkadaval.
